name: Duel (itch) (Nise_)
description:
"Duel" is a  game I made for a personal 72 hour game jam in order to practice game development. Feel free to post any criticism you may have.

I recommend you play the game in fullscreen.

----------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

Space + W,A,S,D to dash

Left Click to attack

Use R to restart the game

Note: If you swing the character before you attack in the direction of the sword strike damage will be doubled.

----------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Art and programming was done by me.

Thanks to Hannah for assistance in game design.

The background music was taken from https://opengameart.org: "Japanese Samurai Ninja Battle" by ISAo licensed OGA-BY 3.0 : https://opengameart.org/content/japanese-samurai-ninja-battle-trailer
